## Generator\_2.injectId() method

Inject a block ID into a message to replace '%1'. Used for STATEMENT\_PREFIX, STATEMENT\_SUFFIX, and INFINITE\_LOOP\_TRAP.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
injectId(msg: string, block: Block): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  msg | string | Code snippet with '%1'. |
|  block | [Block](./blockly.block.md) | Block which has an ID. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

Code snippet with ID.
